history.content:
Vobile (SEHK: 3738) is a SaaS industry leader around the world in intellectual property protection, monetization, and marketing. It was honored as a winner of the 69th annual Technology and Engineering Emmy Awards for its innovation excellence in developing video identification technology to protect content value and copyright. We are guided by data, a love of entertainment, and an entrepreneurial spirit, servicing the world’s largest platforms, film studios, TV networks, sports leagues, music labels, and other content owners.

You’ll be joining a dedicated, focused video and image application team.

We offer health/dental/vision insurance, unlimited PTO, and a 401(k).

Here’s what you’ll get to do:

  • Develop FFPEG filters and FFPEG applications to support the various applications of company’s digital fingerprinting and watermarking technologies.

Here’s what we’re looking for:

  • BS CS/EE, or equivalent.
  • Demonstrated experience with the development of FFMPEG filters and FFMPEG applications.
  • At least two-year software development experience in C.
  • Familiarity with Linux and Linux software development environment and tools.
  • Familiarity with XML and XML libraries and APIs.
  • Familiarity with video codecs such as H.264 and H.265.
  • Demonstrated communication skills, both written and verbal.

Bonus Points you have experience working with:

  • Image processing libraries such as Intel IPP and/or OpenCV.
  • DASH and DASH Player.

If this sounds like you, send us a cover letter and resume to: careers at vobileinc.com

Vobile is an equal opportunity employer. We believe diversity of thoughts, experiences, and backgrounds is critical and we are invested in creating a welcoming, supportive, close-knit environment. We strongly encourage women, non-binary people, LGBTQ+ candidates, and people of color to apply. Unfortunately, we cannot offer visa sponsorships at this time, so being authorized to work in the U.S. is a precondition of employment.
history.subject: Opportunity: Video Software Engineer
